ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 26 Apr 1999, Stefan Raets wrote:
> About the language thing: you're right, but if you only have a few
> points in the language, I don't think people will be able to
> understand you. I think it's the EQ equivalent of speaking broken
> English - the chance of being misunderstood is bigger if your language
> skill is very low. Just a conjecture , of course.
> My friends have started practicing languages during my increasingly
> longer meditations. Just start chattering away in your race language,
> and in a few minutes you will see some gain.

My theory on this is you can only teach others up to your level in the
language, or parhaps a bit less (seems logical that you can not teach them
to speak better than you can). That's too bad, I'd have loved raising my
Old Erudian just talking with someone who also only put 1 point in it :)

Do you get one new language every two levels to train with, or is this
random ? Or perhaps it depends on what critters you encounter ?
I wanna learn griffin :)

Ramagh - level 10 (and raising !) wizard - Fenin Ro.
